android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description: Allows an application to read all of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications can use this to send your data to other people.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows an application to configure the local Bluetooth phone and to discover and pair with remote devices.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.GET_TASKS.description: Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.exutech.chacha.app.mvp.common.MainActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. playstore_details.title: HOLLA: Live Random Video Chat, Meet New People
playstore_details.description:
Helo yo! Say hi to the most swaggy chat alternative or video chatting social app in 2019 --- live swipe cards & instant video chat! Swipe, video match and voice match instantly, say hello, chat & talk now and finally meet up via this free social app! Don’t just swipe dead cards and wait online anxiously, but swipe live cards to meet people nearby and hang out online or offline! Random video chat and voice call now, talk free!
 
 Lovely Features  :
👋 Swipe to meet new people and make friends 👋
🎉 Live Vidio chat instantly to get more vibe 🎉
🎙 Live voice chat to feel the voice vibe! 🎙    
😜 Easy to use & free international live video call and voice call 😜
👮 Safe local chat & live talk community 👮
🤩 Young social app 🤩
🤗 Friendship or relationship, friends or soulmate, up to you 🤗
🌍 Meet people all over the world 🌏
 
Wanna meet new people & meet girls or holaa guy, talk with strangers, random vidio chat & voice chat nearby? Try instant video and voice chatting app! Find friends, have a holaa relaxed chat free!
 
Free chatting app & random chat rooms? Meet up with new people in this hola app! Meeting local and hang out free!
 
If you love surprise in free chat app, random chat online, chat with strangers, you won’t know who’s next to meet chat online and hang out!
 
 Other Guy or Girl Chatting Tips:
 
💡Say hello when text live chat with stranger and say hala to start a new chat rooms! It works in other girl talk app too! Match, chat, go live and meet local people!
 
💡Start a live chat alternative discussing common interests. If you like hula girl app, talk about chat live! If you like local hook up or chat live stories, find friends and share ideas, teen chat app free & real time chat for stranger!
 
💡More than social app or random talk app! Use our live video effects in free chatting app! Talk now! Share this local hula video app with your bf or gf. More hula social app & games are coming!
 
💡Not like other social video chatting & voice chatting app, Holle redefined chat. Ola holo! No other free chat app free provides high quality chat this fast. Holle guy uses free chatting app to talk with strangers! Teen chat now and chat nearby me. Helo yo! Wanna chat with strangers and meet local people? Hang out and meet friends free on new girl talk app! Chat online has way more fun than hook up. It’s so fun to chat with girls and meet with strangers!
 
💡Not like other match video app, we provides the best hala chat and match online. No other better social video app. Not only hillo meet local, but also meet foreigners around the world! Wanna meet up with local free “nearby me”? The easiest way to talk with strangers and meet with strangers!
 
💡Helo yo! Don’t just hook up, but teen chat with girls and boys on hala! Lovely people hang out doesn’t just mean chat with strangers, meet with strangers & meet new people! Holaa soulmate wants to meet up!
 
Hola social app free is not about hillo local online or match online. People say hi & hello, meet local people, meet up make friends and hang out ! Come and try free chat app! Text live chat rooms & chat vidio call vc take place every sec. To meet new people via text live match free video call, find friends, build relationships are such fun on Holle. 
 
Other Permissions:
📷: chat vidio call, take profile pics before go live
🎤: say hi during chat vidio call to meet people “nearby me”
📍: location-based hillo match chatting for girls and boys around
🔔: stay tuned with new friends requests
 
Yo ola holo! if you enjoy instant chat, instant video call and voice call vc or talk live, share with lovely friends for fun!
 
More chat nearby events, social app free & random vidio chat app free tips, meet us & talk now:
IG: @holla
FB: @chillwithHOLLA
